name: Nekomata
skill: Restores 723/863 HP to all allies. Targets deal 36%/43% more DMG for a limited time.
ability: Slightly increases ATK speed of all allies.
Moderately increases the ATK speed of all allies when Socrates is on the team.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a cat that was once looked after by a certain master. She eventually became a spirit after living for a very long time as a cat. She's fond of humans on account of a loving master. And, maybe also thanks to her old master, she has a slightly philosophical bent. She's good friends with Socrates, and they often discuss things at great length. Many philosophical concepts appear quite different from the perspective of a cat, so talking with her definitely makes you think about things in a new way.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 31/06/17 to 07/06/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 200 Mochi 31/06/17 - 07/06/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 07/06/17
◦ Can only be exchanged once

main: "You wanna talk to little old me?"
